topicSummary: Urticaria is a superficial swelling of the skin (epidermis and mucous membranes) that results in a red, raised, itchy rash.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Adverse effect section of non-sedating antihistamines updated to reflect changes to SPC.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in March 2017 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key controlled trials (RCTs) published since the last revision of the topic. Changes to the topic include:
